metadata.title: CVE-2020-15114 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In etcd before versions 3.3.23 and 3.4.10, the etcd gateway is a simple TCP proxy to allow for basic service discovery and access. However, it is possible to include the gateway address as an endpoint. This results in a denial of service, since the endpoint can become stuck in a loop of requesting itself until there are no more available file descriptors to accept connections on the gateway.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

etcd - 3.3.23
etcd-client - 3.3.23
etcd-server - 3.3.23
No subscription required

criterions.comment: etcd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.23').
